item.title: Learning Resources
item.description: Photo by Thought Catalog on UnsplashThis is a collection of learning resources. I’ll update this frequently. AWS Advanced Networking - Course - Chapter 8 focuses on Infrastructure as Code (IaC) in particular (CloudFormation, CDK). AWS Architect - Learning Path DevOps - Learning Path AWS Data - Learning Path
